## Welcome

Welcome to the supplementary information repository for "Genomic diversity of mammalian gut microbiome derived Lachnospiraceae associated with the microbiome-gut-brain axis", by Kamat _et al._

## How to use the repository

The [GitHub repository](https://github.com/sipbs-compbiol/SI_Kamat_et_al_Clostridium_diversity) associated with this page contains supporting data for the Kamat _et al._ paper "Genomic diversity of mammalian gut microbiome derived Lachnospiraceae associated with the microbiome-gut-brain axis." It also provides scripts used to generate the supporting data.

To clone the repository to your own machine using `git`, issue the command:

```bash
git clone git@github.com:sipbs-compbiol/SI_Kamat_et_al_Clostridium_diversity
```

All data and analyses can be found in the `assets/analysis` subdirectory.
